definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: He replied to Hogan and sent him a plot of the noise.
sentences.chinese: 他回信給霍根並寄去一段噪音的曲線圖。

sentences.english: Moral behavior, however, is scattered all over the chart.
sentences.chinese: 但是道德行爲卻分散在曲線圖的每個角落。

sentences.english: See the graph above and below for the numbers.
sentences.chinese: 看看上面的曲線圖和下面的數字吧。

sentences.english: Found with the selected metering pump performance curve of the corresponding.
sentences.chinese: 找到與所選用的計量泵相應的性能曲線圖。

sentences.english: A tri-display includes a bar graph showing continuous change in acidity or alkalinity.
sentences.chinese: 一幅三視條形曲線圖顯示出物質酸鹼度的連續變化。

sentences.english: In Australia EREY is not yet at the top of the chart but it is a rising star.
sentences.chinese: 還未達到曲線圖的頂端但它是一顆正在上升的星晨。

sentences.english: Graphs give data in a two-dimensional picture.
sentences.chinese: 曲線圖可標出二維平面圖形上的數據。

sentences.english: The graph in Figure 1 shows this data for three projects.
sentences.chinese: 圖一中的曲線圖表明三個項目的數據。

sentences.english: The graph will rescale to show the region you selected.
sentences.chinese: 曲線圖將重新分度以顯示你所選的區域。

sentences.english: He tried to illustrate the fact with a diagram of curves based on rough estimates.
sentences.chinese: 他試圖以根據粗略估計做出的曲線圖來說明情況。

sentences.english: Monochrome terminals display the graphs using different kinds of lines.
sentences.chinese: 單色終端使用不同種類的線顯示曲線圖。

sentences.english: You'll also see several metrics being monitored and graphed.
sentences.chinese: 您還將看到若干度量數據正受到監視並繪製曲線圖。
